name: handoff_summary
description: Generate a concise 2-3 sentence summary for the next agent

output.name: summary
output.description: 2-3 sentence summary: who is calling, what they need, what was accomplished, what the next agent should do

guidelines: Focus on RELEVANT information for the next agent
Use natural language, not bullet points
Be specific about names, IDs, and status

output.summary: Devon from State Farm is calling about John Doe's case. They need case information. Look up John Doe's file and ask what specific info they need.
Sarah Smith is an existing client wanting to speak with her case manager Victoria Morales (ID: 18). Case status is Pre-Lit Treating. Get consent and transfer to Victoria.

Attempted to transfer Sarah Smith to Victoria Morales but transfer failed. Sarah is an existing client wanting an update on her case. Collect callback number and take message for Victoria. Mark as standard priority.

input.purpose: trying to reach case manager for weeks

output.summary: Michael Johnson is an existing client who has been trying to reach his case manager for two weeks. He's very frustrated about lack of callbacks. Transfer failed. Take message and mark as URGENT priority.
